long_description: Weighing in at only 45g, the lightweight Petzl Spirit Spirit Screw-Lock Carabiner is perfect for building anchors and clipping into belay stations. Manual screw gate system features red band indicator to show carabiner is unlocked, providing a quick visual safety check. H-shaped profile offers an excellent strength-to-weight ratio; carabiner weighs only 45g, which is lighter than many other locking 'biners. Rope-bearing surfaces are designed to enhance rope positioning and movement without adding excess weight. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip.
short_description: Weighing in at only 45g, the lightweight Petzl Spirit Spirit Screw-Lock Carabiner is perfect for building anchors and clipping into belay stations.
